scripts.build: babel django_project_base/static/src -d django_project_base/static/build --copy-files && babel node_modules/@webcomponents/webcomponentsjs/webcomponents-bundle.js --out-dir django_project_base/static/build --copy-files && babel node_modules/@webcomponents/webcomponentsjs/webcomponents-loader.js --out-dir django_project_base/static/build --copy-files && babel node_modules/@webcomponents/webcomponentsjs/custom-elements-es5-adapter.js --out-dir django_project_base/static/build --copy-files
